FILE.name: bribe
FILE.STRING: The American government is outraged at your aggression in its territory. The DEFCON level has risen by one. You have pulled your troops out of this mission to avoid further mishap.
Our mission has successfully put a friendly regime in power here. As a result, the $STRING0 are now our client state.
Our mission is a success. We have looted the towns we captured and found 100 Tribute.

FILE.name: hostages
FILE.STRING: Hint: The Hostages are being held in buildings that have a flag on them.
The hostages' families have paid us $NUM0 Tribute reward and we have gained a Military Eureka Bonus Card.
The hostages' families have paid us $NUM0 Tribute reward.

FILE.name: infiltrate
FILE.STRING: Hint: You will be defeated if you take an enemy city.
As a result of our infiltrations, we have received a Great Thinker Bonus Card.

FILE.name: militia
FILE.STRING: You have razed the city of $STRING0. The local Citizens have joined your revolt.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained control of $s0! We have also gained Political Dissidents Bonus Card.
As a result of our successful mission, we have collected $d0 Tribute! We have also gained a Political Dissidents Bonus Card.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained control of $s0! We have also gained Political Dissidents Bonus Card.
As a result of our successful mission, we have collected $d0 Tribute! We have also gained a Political Dissidents Bonus Card.

FILE.name: sub
FILE.STRING: Our success has gained us 100 Tribute along with a Trade Embargo Bonus Card.

FILE.name: afghanruntime
FILE.STRING: Destroy all enemy buildings and capture all enemy cities before the timer runs out.
Hint: Use your Helicopters to patrol the map.

FILE.name: americafinalruntime
FILE.STRING: Destroy the Oil Wells and Refineries located in the west.
Destroy the Missile Silos at the Baykonur Cosmodrome.
Rescue the Scientists being held in the Military Base by garrisoning them in your Fort.
You have razed the city of $STRING0. The local Citizens have defected and joined your force.
Destroy the Military Base that is located in the northeast.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, and $d0 Soviet Nuclear Missile has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, and $d0 Soviet Nuclear Missiles have been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, $d0 Tribute and $d1 Soviet Nuclear Missile has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, $d0 Tribute and $d1 Soviet Nuclear Missiles have been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, and $d0 Tribute.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, and $d0 Soviet Nuclear Missile has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, and $d0 Soviet Nuclear Missiles have been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, $d0 Tribute, and $d1 Soviet Nuclear Missile has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, $d0 Tribute, and $d1 Soviet Nuclear Missiles have been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, and $d0 Tribute.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, $d0 Tribute, and $d1 Soviet Nuclear Missile has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Cultural Dominance Bonus Card, a Trade Embargo Bonus Card, $d0 Tribute, and $d1 Soviet Nuclear Missiles have been destroyed!

FILE.name: bayofpigsruntime
FILE.STRING: Help the exiles capture the enemy capital.
The initial invasion has failed. We can press on and commit to a full invasion of Cuba, but this will have severe repercussions on our diplomatic standing with the rest of the world.

The Soviets are angry that we have taken a large role in this invasion, and while they will not intervene militarily, they have sent advisors to train Castro's army and supply them with the latest technologies.

FILE.name: bombdropruntime
FILE.STRING: Destroy the Oil Wells and the Refineries located near Vladivostok in the west.
Destroy the Oil Wells and the Refinery located near Khabarovsk in the north.
Use your Special Forces units to jam the Radar Air Defense guns by moving near the radar installations.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Sabotage Bonus Card, a Mercenaries Bonus Card, and a Logistics Bonus Card.

FILE.name: centralruntime
FILE.STRING: With the signing of our alliance, the Guatemalans will repair all our land vehicles.
As a token of appreciation for the new alliance, the Salvadorans are increasing your Oil rate by 50.
The Nicaraguans have agreed to let us train their Guerilla Fighters at our Redoubt in gratitude for our new alliance.
The Costa Ricans have agreed to help us build our ships 75% faster as part of our alliance.
With the end of our alliance, the Guatemalans will no longer repair our vehicles.
The Nicaraguans will no longer help us train Guerilla Fighters.
The Costa Ricans will no longer help us build our ships faster.
We will need a more compelling offer from you.
Hint: Choose an ally. Each nation provides a different bonus. Click on a nation's capital to find out what bonus it provides.
The Nicaraguans have agreed to let us train their Recoilless Guns at our Barracks in gratitude for our new alliance.
The Nicaraguans have agreed to let us train their Dragon AT Missiles at our Barracks in gratitude for our new alliance.
The Nicaraguans will no longer help us train Recoilless Guns.
The Nicaraguans will no longer help us train Dragon AT Missiles.
Ally bonus: Gain Unique Heavy Infantry
The Salvadorans will no longer send us their Oil.
Ally bonus: Discover an ancient Wonder
Ally bonus: They will not ally with you
Ally bonus: Gain a secret weapon
The Costa Ricans have handed over a secret weapon to us, but warn us its use has grave consequences.
The Salvadorans have destroyed the Temple of Tikal.
The remaining nations have decided they cannot defeat you alone.
The Costa Ricans have destroyed our blueprints for Attack Helicopters.
The Costa Ricans have taught us how to build Attack Helicopters.
The Costa Ricans have thanked us for our alliance with a one-time gift of 500 Oil.
The Salvadorans have shared with us the hidden location of the Temple of Tikal. Apparently it was not far from our city of $STRING0.

FILE.name: coldwar_battles
FILE.STRING: The American armies are exceptionally well trained. We do not want to push them too hard or we could find ourselves on the brink of nuclear war.
The Afghan government is adapting a philosophy that does not agree with our policies. We should show them the error of their ways.
The Argentinean government has rejected all of our requests to talk. The Argentinean people deserve a government that is not so isolationist. We should help them.
A large of portion of Brazil is covered by jungle. Expect to fight your way through lots of trees.
The Central Amercian nations do not always get along with each other. Expect to play one side off of another in this country.
This will be a tough battle. The Chinese have a very large army and will use their knowledge of the countryside to stymie us.
The Colombian government has promised to join our cause if we defeat several rebel armies that are plaguing their countryside.
The Congo is ruled by a dictator who does not like our policies. We should help the people to install a better government.
The Egyptians are fighting a rebel army that has taken up arms in the Suez Canal. We should help one of them.
The Ethiopian government has rebuffed all of our overtures of friendship. We should help the Ethiopian people install a friendlier government.
The Indian government has misled its people into believing that we do not have their best interests at heart. We must bring them into our protective arms and show them otherwise.
OPEC controls a large portion of the world's wealth. We should acquire a share.
The Japanese main island has been outfitted with all the latest defensive technology. We will have a hard fight ahead of us here.
The Mexican government is conducting policy that is detrimental to our interests. We should help the Mexican people install a government that has their best possible interests at heart.
NATO is made up of several modern countries. They will not take our direct intervention lightly.
The Algerian government has made some questionable decisions lately. We should help the Algerian people install a more thoughtful government.
The South African government has ignored all of our advice for their domestic policies. We should help the South African people install a government that is a little more willing to listen.
The Warsaw Pact is made up of several modern countries. They will not take our direct intervention lightly.
This territory has been laid waste. There is no semblance of civilization here. We must bring order back to this land.
The Hungarians are staging a revolt. If we were to attack here now, we could count on their support.
The Czechoslovakians have recently passed reforms that have upset the Soviets, and so are under attack. If we were to attack here now, we could count on their support.
We should expect a hard battle here.
Egypt is important for its strategic location, as a focal point for trade through the Suez Canal. If we were to capture it for ourselves, it would deal a significant blow to our enemy.
A large portion of Brazil is covered by jungle. Expect to fight your way through lots of trees.
The Mongolian government has made some questionable decisions lately. We should help the Mongolian people install a more thoughtful government.
Remember, you signed an agreement not to attack China before the Information Age. If you break that agreement it could have grave consequences.
The Soviet Union is capable of fielding large armies. We should tread very lightly where they are concerned as the threat of nuclear annihilation hangs over us all.
Fidel Castro is a headstrong leader who does not like to bow to outside pressure. We should help the Cuban people install a more amenable leader.

The Korean people have split into two factions, one supporting capitalism and one supporting communism. We should intervene and help the Korean people realize which is the right path for them to take.
The Peruvian government has been unable to defeat the guerrilla groups that have taken to the Andes Mountains. The government has promised their support to us if we rid them of this threat.

The Vietnamese people have split into two factions, one supporting capitalism and one supporting communism. We should intervene and help the Vietnamese people realize which is the right path for them to take.
Farms will not be an option in this harsh northern climate. We can expect to find it rich in Fish and Oil, however.

FILE.name: coldwar_diplo
FILE.STRING: We are not interested in your territories. Offer us Tribute, and we will then evaluate your offer.
You have to be kidding. There is no way we would trade you our territories.
We have no interest in negotiating with you. Your empire will soon crumble and then the world will be ours.
Yes, let us end this terrible war!
Very well. We will end this war and sign your peace treaty.
Alright, we need some time to prepare for a new assault as well.
Yes, we agree. Peace is in the best interests of everyone.
These are excellent terms! We will agree to this peace treaty.
Do not jest with us. We would sooner launch our nuclear missiles on ourselves then become your client state.
Yes. Who would not want to join with your great nation?
Your offer is a fair one, and our armies will now march alongside yours.
We needed a change of government anyways.
We agree. Who do we have to kill first?
That is a fair offer. We will become your client state.
We accept your tribute with gratitude.
And you want nothing in return? Well ok if you say so.
Your gift comes at the perfect time! Now we can upgrade our capital's defenses and make it invulnerable.
Our leader is always happy to accept such gifts.
We yield. We will pay this tribute to you.
We feel it would be prudent to give in to your demands at this time.
OK! OK! Please don't squash us.
Why should we pay you? If anything, you should pay us!
This is outrageous! We will never acquiesce to such extortion.
Is this a joke? You are kidding aren't you?
This deal would be more to our liking.
You have nothing to offer us that will make us give up our independence.
We will not give up our freedom for such a paltry sum.
You will have to give us much more than that if you expect us to listen to you.
Our great nation will never bow before the boot of tyranny.
We will never sell our nation for so little. You do not have enough to interest us at present.
Only a fool would sign that treaty!
Only your utter destruction will end this war
We are not as weak as you, and we will see this war through until the very end.
We do not see how this benefits us. Our answer is no.
Come back in a few turns when you have things that interest us.
You do not have enough to interest us at present.
We have no desire to manage your pitiful territories, our Tribute will stay our own!
We have no need for Bonus Cards! We need all of our Tribute to make our nation prosper.
We have no desire to manage your pitiful territories. We have enough trouble managing what we have already.
We have no need for Bonus Cards! They will not help make our nation prosper.
Are you here to negotiate, or to waste our time?
We tire of your games. Offer us a real proposal, or be done with it!
Apparently negotiation is not one of the finer points of education in your nation.
That is one of the worst offers I have ever seen. Is it some kind of joke?
We did not come here to play around. If this is the best you can offer, then perhaps we should end these negotiations.
We are not willing to trade you our Bonus Cards. If you need any, try buying them.

FILE.name: coldwar_diplo_offer
FILE.STRING: We are in need of Tribute. Please accept us as a client state.
Let us forget our mutual transgressions on the Korean peninsula. There is no need to escalate global tension over the matter. Let us sign peace. We will not make this offer again.

The old capitalist-friendly regime that plagued Cuba has been overthrown. We are now in control, although the revolution was costly. If you would be so kind to provide us with some economic aid, we would become your client state. We will be receptive to future offers, but you are not likely to find us offering so much for so little again.
Let us not permit a minor conflict in Africa to destroy our friendship. Let us sign peace and forget about any transgressions. This offer will not be repeated.

The old capitalist-friendly regime that plagued Cuba has been overthrown, although the revolution was costly. If you were to provide us with some economic aid, we would become your client state. We will be receptive to future offers, but do not expect such good terms again.

The capitalist-friendly regime of Cuba has been overthrown, although the revolution was costly. If you were to provide us economic aid, we would become your client state. We will be receptive to future offers, but do not expect such good terms.
Our Communist friends the Chinese seem no longer able to support our cause. Perhaps you would be interested in our service as a client state of the Soviet Union?
For some reason our budget has hit a shortfall this year. Without help, we will not be able to pay workers at our Nuclear Missile facilities, and we would hate for a misfire to occur because of it.
Taxes did not seem to meet our expectations for this year. Perhaps you could help us out? Otherwise, we might have to resort to launching a few Nuclear Missiles at your territories.
Give us the requested Tribute or we will set your territories on fire with our Nuclear Missiles.
We are falling behind in the nuclear arms race. If we do not keep up, the $STRING0 might use their nuclear advantage to threaten usâ€”or even worse, to bring utter destruction to our nation.
The $STRING0 have requested a sumit meeting with us immediately to chat about an important subject.
The $STRING0 insist that we convene a sumit meeting with them to talk about a matter of great importance.
The $STRING0 require our presence at a sumit meeting to discuss their troubles at home. Not meeting with them could lead to grave consequences.
The South Africans wish to convene a sumit meeting with us.
The Soviets wish to discuss our recent conflict and work out a peaceful solution.
The Soviets would like to convene a sumit meeting before tensions get out of control.
Now that Cuba is free of their capitalist masters, their new leaders would like to hold a sumit meeting with us.
A North Korean diplomat has come to Moscow to discuss our diplomatic relationship. Shall we meet with him?
The Congolese have sent word they wish to hold a summit meeting with us.
The Americans would like to convene a summit meeting before tensions get out of control.
The Americans wish to come to a peaceful resolution of our latest conflict.
The $STRING0 have requested an immediate summit meeting with us to discuss an important subject.
The $STRING0 insist that we convene a summit meeting with them to talk about a matter of great importance.
The $STRING0 require our presence at a summit meeting to discuss their troubles at home. Not meeting with them could lead to grave consequences.
The South Africans wish to meet with us.
The Soviets would like to convene a summit meeting before these hostilities spiral out of control.
Now that Cuba is free of their capitalist masters, their new leaders would like to meet with us.
The Congolese have sent word they wish to discuss an important matter with us.
The Americans would like to convene a summit meeting before these hostilities spiral out of control.
Let us forget our mutual transgressions on the battlefield. There is no need to escalate global tension over the matter. Let us sign peace. We will not make this offer again.
Let us not permit a minor conflict to destroy our friendship. Let us sign peace and forget about any transgressions. This offer will not be repeated.

Let us stop this madness before it goes too far! We offer you this deal in the interest of balancing the power in this world. If you do not accept, we may be forced to protect our interests by using the only means left to us.
The socialist countries of the world need to stick together. We just need a little Tribute to convince our people that we are making the right choice. This is a one-time offer.

FILE.name: coldwar_init
FILE.STRING: Rebuild each territory of NATO to infrastructure level 3, or they may switch allegiance and join the Warsaw Pact. Station an army in a territory that has unrest to quell it for a turn.
The Soviets plan to attack South Korea next turn. Pre-emptively attack North Korea to stop the invasion.
Rebuild each territory of the Warsaw Pact to infrastructure level 3, or they may switch allegiance and join NATO. Station an army in a territory that has unrest to quell it for a turn.
We should attack South Korea this turn before the Americans sign an agreement with them and build up their territory strength.
The Middle East is of great strategic importance. If we sent an army there this turn we could prevent the Americans from reaching into South Asia for the near future.
The Soviets plan to send troops to South Korea next turn. Pre-emptively lead the UN forces to South Korea to stop the invasion.

FILE.name: coldwar_post_turn
FILE.STRING: There has been a socialist revolution in Cuba! The new regime is not as friendly to you as the old one was. Cuba has become a client state of the USSR.
There has been a socialist revolution in Cuba! Cuba has thrown off the imperialistic yoke of the capitalists.
Your friends in Europe are starting to complain about our lack of support. If they are not appeased soon with increased territory strength, they may do something drastic.
$s0 does not feel you have shown their people enough support. They have decided to see what the other side of the Iron Curtain looks like.
Rebuild each territory of NATO to territory strength Level 3, or they may switch allegiance and join the Warsaw Pact. Station an army in a territory that has unrest to quell it for a turn.
The Soviets plan to attack South Korea this turn. Preemptively attack South Korea to stop the invasion.
South Korea's territory strength has gone up two levels due to the increased defenses installed there during the battle against North Korea.

We have successfully stopped the Russians from gaining control of the Middle East. An additional 50 Tribute has been given to us by the local regime. Also, in response to our greater presence in the region, the Soviets have increased Kazakhstan's territory strength by 2.
Rebels in Egypt have sent word that the time to strike is now if we want their help.
We need to put down the socialist revolt in Cuba before the Soviets take advantage of it themselves.
A revolt has broken out in Central Europe. Their territory strength has fallen. If we were to go there now, we would surely have support from the rebels.
Southeast Asia is under heavy attack from Communist forces. We will have to send an army there if we wish to keep it from falling into Communist hands.
Rebellion has broken out in part of Central Europe, counter to Soviet dogma. If we were to attack there now, we would surely have support from the rebels.
The Soviets are up to something in Afghanistan. We should make an agreement with the Afghans now, or risk the Soviets moving in soon.
The Panamanians are close to signing a deal with the Soviets. We should attack there soon if we want to stop them.

Voters at home are complaining of the deplorable state we allow our territories to fall into. Try to make sure all territories (including your client states) are above territory strength Level 1 before next turn.
Rebuild each territory of the Warsaw Pact to infrastructure level 3, or they may switch allegiance and join NATO. Station an army in a territory that has unrest to quell it for a turn.
We should attack South Korea this turn before the Americans sign an agreement with them and build up their territory strength.
The Americans are sending their support to a faction in the Middle East. If we are not careful, the Middle East will fall into America's hands.

We have successfully stopped the Americans from gaining control of the Middle East. An additional 50 Tribute was found by our troops. Also, in response to our greater presence in the region, America has increased Turkey's territory strength by 2.
The Americans are up to something in Egypt. We should go there to investigate and while we are at it, put a more friendly regime in control.
The Communists who recently came to power in Cuba should be easy to negotiate with if we try to do so this turn.

A revolt has broken out in Central Europe that has reduced its territory strength by two levels. We should reinforce the territory strength by two levels or the Americans will take advantage of the opportunity.
Reinforce Central Europe with armies and increased territory strength to dissuade the Americans from taking advantage of the revolt.
Rumor has it that the Americans will be sending forces to Vietnam soon. If we were to send our forces first though, they would have to stay clear.

Our successful salvation of Southeast Asia has left the Americans without an attack plan for the near future. In addition, Australia's territory strength has dropped by 2 due to the loss of Southeast Asia as a trading partner.
Reports indicate that the Americans will soon sign a deal with the South Africans, and then use South Africa as a base from which to attack Central Africa.
Reinforce Central Europe with armies and territory strength in case the Americans decide to strike the rebel regime.
There is word of strife in Afghanistan. We should attack there now, before the Americans take advantage of it themselves.
Revolutionaries in Argentina are asking for our help. If we assist them now, they are willing to lend us their services in later battles.

Your advisors have come up with a plan to fund Guerrilla Fighters in either South America or Africa, but not both. They would lower the territory strength level in every country on the continent by one.
Territory strength has dropped by one all over Africa.
Territory strength has dropped by one all over South America.
The Panamanians are close to signing a deal with the Americans. We should attack there within the next two turns if we want to prevent this deal from happening.
The Hungarians are staging a revolt in Central Europe. If we were to attack there now, we could count on their support in the battle.
Czechoslovakia has rebelled from the Warsaw Pact. Facing increasing pressure, they are asking for our help in Central Europe. If we attack there now, we can count on their support in the battle.
Excellent, we are glad that we could agree upon this matter of worldwide importance.
Very well, but you might feel foolish in a few turns when we have nuclear weapons aimed at your capital.

$STRING0 are sending word that they wish to end the spiral of nuclear war that we have begun before it is too late. They propose that we both agree to build no more nuclear weapons and destroy the ones we currently have.
Neither side will threaten the world with nuclear annihilation any longer!
$STRING0 are disappointed with our choice, but they understand our fear of defeat. They warn us to not expect them to stop building nuclear weapons either.
$STRING0 to submit to the Soviets and $STRING1 joined the United States rather than be absorbed by the Soviet with the rest of NATO!
Your superior industry has driven the Soviet economy into collapse!
Your superior industry has driven the American economy into collapse!
The Middle East is located in an area of great strategic importance. If we sent an army there soon we could prevent the Americans from reaching into South Asia for the near future.

Your advisors have come up with a plan to fund Guerrilla Fighters in either South America for 40 Tribute or Africa for 50 Tribute, but not both (we have $NUM0 Tribute). They would lower the territory strength level in every country on the continent by one.
The Soviets plan to send troops to South Korea this turn. Preemptively lead UN forces to South Korea to stop the invasion.
We should send troops to South Korea this turn before the Americans sign an agreement with them and build up their territory strength.
There has been a socialist revolution in Cuba! The new regime is not as friendly to you as the old one was. Intelligence reports that Cuba will soon become a client state of the USSR.

Our Spies await orders. Click on the Espionage Mission button, located under the mini-map, to conduct an Espionage Mission. Great reward can be had, and this action can be taken in addition to attacking this turn.

Through skillful planning, diplomacy, and relentless military pressure, you have defeated the Soviet Union! Avoiding a nuclear holocaust, you managed to strike into the heart of the Soviet empire and let the world know that no nation will stand in the way of freedom!
We must make sure our remaining friends in NATO are happy by making sure their territory strength is at least 3 or by stationing an army in their territory.
We must make sure our remaining friends in the Warsaw Pact are happy by making sure their territory strength is at least 3 or by stationing an army in their territory.
Insurgents have knocked down the territory strength of Central Europe by two levels. We will have to quickly restore two levels of strength or the Americans will certainly attack there.

$s0 is unhappy that you have not shown their people much support. The army stationed there is the only thing that has deterred them from defecting. However, if we do not raise their territory strength, the army will not be able to prevent a defection a second time.

No true comrade ever doubted that the struggle between bourgeois American imperialists and the noble proletariat would end in any other way. Our brave soldiers have marched to Washington and permanently ended the tiresome grunting of the capitalist pigs.
Congress, desiring to demostrate our technological superiority, has appropriated the funds for a Wonder of the World. Play this Bonus Card to build the Supercollider or the Space Program.

It appears that the Party will stay afloat for the time being. In thanks for the money, the Party has donated Political Dissidents to be used against the Americans. We have acquired a Political Dissidents Bonus Card.
In gratitude for our help, the revolutionaries have provided us with two contingents of Mercenaries. We have acquired two Mercenaries Bonus Cards.
Reports indicate that the Americans will soon sign a deal with the South Africans, and then use Southern Africa as a base from which to attack Central Africa.
Revolutionaries in Patagonia are asking for our help. If we assist them now, they are willing to lend us their services in later battles.
Many of our friends are disgusted by the way we ignored our agreement not to attack China. $STRING0 has left $STRING1 and joined $STRING2 rather than be accomplice to a liar.
The current government of the Middle East is interested in the rewards of becoming a client state, but they're taking offers from both sides!
The Congolese are being threatened by the Soviets. We should establish a client state relationship with them so that the Soviets will focus their attention elsewhere.
The people are losing spirit as we fall further behind in the nuclear arms race. We need to surpass the Americans in Nuclear Missiles within three turns in order to allay the concerns of the people.

The Communist Party is running short on funds. If we do not capture territories that total 5 territory strength, or build up 5 territory strength elsewhere, we will have to scrap some territory strength in Russia.

$STRING0 have approached us to talk about disarmament. They are willing to destroy two of their Nuclear Missiles if we are willing to do the same. Doing this will lesson the chance of nuclear armageddon.
In response to our successful efforts to strengthen our territories, we have received a Great Thinker. We have acquired a Great Thinker Bonus Card.
Our people are rejoicing in the streets due to our newfound dominance in Nuclear Missiles. We have received an Economic Boom Bonus Card of every type.
Unfortunately, we were unable to secure funding for the Party. The unrest caused by this has damaged Western Russia two levels of territory strength.
The Mongolians are close to signing a deal with the Soviets. Now might be our only chance to negotiate our own deal with them.
In response to our successful efforts to strengthen our territories, we have acquired a Great Thinker Bonus Card.

Voters at home are complaining of the deplorable state we allow our territories to fall into. We should try to make sure all territories (including your client states) are above territory strength Level 1 before next turn. However, there will not be any consequences if we keep the status quo.

Voters at home are complaining of the deplorable state we allow our territories to fall into. We should try to make sure all territories (including your client states) are above territory strength Level 1.
The people are losing spirit as we fall further behind in the nuclear arms race. If we were to pass the Americans in Nuclear Missiles within three turns the people would rejoice.

FILE.name: countermissileruntime
FILE.STRING: Protect our Oil Wells in the central region.
Protect our Missile Silos north of Yalta.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained one Sabotage Bonus Card.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained two Sabotage Bonus Cards.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained three Sabotage Bonus Cards.

FILE.name: guerillaactionruntime
FILE.STRING: As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Mercenaries Bonus Card and control of $s0!
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Mercenaries Bonus Card and control of $s0!
As a result of our successful mission, we gained a Mercenaries Bonus Card and $d0 Tribute!

FILE.name: korea3runtime
FILE.STRING: The Chinese are willing to come to our aid in this battle, but only if we accept a non-agression treaty until Information Age. We will not be able to attack them until then if we sign the treaty.
The Chinese, as part of our client state agreement, have sent troops to aid us in battle.
The Chinese have come to aid their American allies in battle!

The Chinese are willing to come to our aid in this battle, but only if we accept a non-aggression treaty until the Information Age. We will not be able to attack them until then if we sign the treaty.

FILE.name: korea4runtime
FILE.STRING: The Chinese are willing to come to our aid in this battle, but only if we accept a non-agression treaty until Information Age. We will not be able to attack them until then if we sign the treaty.
The Chinese, as part of our client state agreement, have sent troops to aid us in battle.
The Chinese have come to aid their American allies in battle!

The Chinese are willing to come to our aid in this battle, but only if we accept a non-aggression treaty until the Information Age. We will not be able to attack them until then if we sign the treaty.

FILE.name: korearuntime
FILE.STRING: Help the South Koreans (Orange) stay in control of Seoul, Taejon, Busan, and Suwon until time expires.
Keep the South Koreans (Orange) in control of their starting cities until time expires.
The South Korean government has escaped from Seoul and set up a new government in Taejon. If we cannot protect them there and take back Seoul, then the battle is lost.

You have successfully halted the North Korean invasion. We now have the opportunity to push into North Korea and unite the two halves of the peninsula under one friendly government. For 30 Tribute we can sustain our presence here for 60 minutes more. If we're successful, we'll gain both North and South Korea.
The Chinese government doesn't like how close we're getting to their border with North Korea and has brought forces to intervene. We must not let them stop us!

FILE.name: missilestrikeruntime
FILE.STRING: Destroy the Oil Wells in the central region of the peninsula.
Destroy the Missile Silos located somewhere north of Yalta.
Use your Spies to call in Missile Strikes.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained two Sabotage Bonus Cards.
Destroy the Missile Silos located somewhere northeast of Simferopol.
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Ukraine has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Karelia has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Kazakhstan has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Western Russia has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Central Russia has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Mongolia has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Eastern Russia has been destroyed!
As a result of our successful mission, a Nuclear Missile in Eastern Europe has been destroyed!

FILE.name: seekdestroyruntime
FILE.STRING: Destroy the Barracks and the Auto Plant in the Oil fields to the south of Kiev.
Destroy the all of the Barracks and the Airbase northwest of Kiev.
Destroy the all of the Siege Factories and the Barracks in the Oil fields across the river from Kiev.
Destroy the Barracks and the Auto Plant in downtown Kharkov.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained a Sabotage Bonus Card and a Propaganda Bonus Card.

FILE.name: southafricaruntime
FILE.STRING: Help the revolutionaries capture the enemy capital.

FILE.name: sovietfinalruntime
FILE.STRING: Infiltrate the three American cities to find the nearby Missile Silos.
Our informers in $STRING0 have revealed the location of the nearby American Missile Silo.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained 200 Tribute and a Wonder of the World Bonus Card.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained 100 Tribute and 1 American Nuclear Missile has been destroyed. We also have acquired a Wonder of the World Bonus Card.
As a result of our successful mission, we have gained 200 Tribute. We also have acquired a Wonder of the World Bonus Card.
As a result of our successful mission, $d0 American Nuclear Missiles have been destroyed! We also have acquired a Wonder of the World Bonus Card.

FILE.name: suezruntime
FILE.STRING: The Egyptians send their thanks, and have asked you to hand Suez and Port Said over to them. If you comply, they will reward us with 50 Tribute and a Food Economic Boom. If we do not, they will declare war on us. If we hand it over to them, then we will not be able to install a friendly regime.

The Egyptians have declared war on us. Apprantly our friendship with the rebels had something to do with it. The rebels have handed Port Said over to us to use as a base, with the understanding that we will be giving all conquered cities over to them.

The Egyptians send their thanks, and have asked you to hand Suez and Port Said over to them. If you comply, they offer us as a reward of either 100 Tribute and their Oath of Fealty, or they will help us stage a coup in $STRING0, making that country our client state. If we do not, they will declare war on us. If we hand it over to them, then we will not be able to install a friendly regime.

The Egyptians send their thanks, and have asked you to hand Suez and Port Said over to them. If you comply, they offer us as a reward of 100 Tribute and their Oath of Fealty. If we do not, they will declare war on us. If we hand it over to them, then we will not be able to install a friendly regime.
The Rebels have decided to throw down their weapons. Apparently their resolve wavered.
The Egyptians send their thanks, and have asked you to hand
Port Said and Suez over to them
Now that the rebels are gone,
the Egyptians have asked you to leave, but they thank you for your concern.

$STRING0 $STRING1. If you comply, they offer us as a reward of either 100 Tribute and their Oath of Fealty, or they will help us stage a coup in $STRING2, making that country our client state. If we do not, they will declare war on us. If we hand it over to them, then we will not be able to install a friendly regime.
The rebels are worried the ruse will not work. They would rather we form an open alliance against the Egyptians, even though this will raise the DEFCON Meter by one level.
The rebels have handed Port Said over to us to use as a base, with the understanding that we will be giving all conquered cities over to them.
Very well, but do not expect us to keep this ruse up for long.
As thanks for coming to their support, the rebels have given us a contingent of Mercenaries. We have received a Mercenaries Bonus Card.

FILE.name: vietnamruntime
FILE.STRING: If South Vietnam (White) is defeated, you lose as well.

Protests have broken out back in the USA due to our prolonged involvement in this war. Will you take this chance to extract your troops from fighting? Or will you keep fighting and try to defeat the Communist threat?
Protesters in the Pacific Rockies have rioted due to the long war and destroyed 3 territory strength levels!

FILE.name: coldwar_post_ai
FILE.STRING: Trickle-down? Voodoo? Who cares? Your booming economy has driven the Soviet Union into collapse! Their centralized system was no match for massive defense spending and American ingenuity. You've melted away the daily terror of cold war over the fires of industry!

Trickle-down? Voodoo? It does not matter, because it did not work. Your failing economy has collapsed! The Soviets' centralized system has outlasted our massive defense spending. The daily terror of cold war has ended with our economic defeat!

The economy of the United States has far outpaced our own! There is no hope of catching up with them. Our satellite nations have lost their faith in the socialist economy and have broken off ties with us. The Soviet Union is at an end!

Through skillful planning, diplomacy, and relentless military pressure, you have defeated the Soviet Union! Avoiding a nuclear holocaust, you managed to strike into the heart of the Soviet empire and let the world know that no nation will stand in the way of freedom!

The superior brawn of the proletariat has forced the American economy into collapse! The immoral capitalists believed that their bourgeois elite could outproduce the comrades of the Soviet Union, but with this victory we have proven that selfless dedication to the socialist path can overcome all obstacles!

No true comrade ever doubted that the struggle between bourgeois American imperialists and the noble proletariat would end in any other way. Our brave soldiers have marched to Washington and permanently ended the tiresome grunting of the capitalist pigs.

The Soviet economy is growing rapidly! If we do not do something to match them, we will surely lose the Cold War. Claim client states through police actions and diplomacy or upgrade your territory strength!

The American economy is growing rapidly! If we do not do something to match them, we will surely lose the Cold War. Claim client states through police actions and diplomacy or upgrade your territory strength!
Your nation's economy has far outpaced the enemy's! Would you like to end the game and declare Industrial Victory?

FILE.name: skirmishruntime2
FILE.STRING: Hint: Capture Oil Wells to raise resource gathering rates.
